data.prayer: Father, help the 14,950 believers in Västerbotten to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Västerbotten, Sweden
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Västerbotten, Sweden. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 17 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Västerbotten, Sweden to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Västerbotten, Sweden to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.prayer: Father, 0.3% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Västerbotten.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Västerbotten, Sweden to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.section_summary:
the state of Västerbotten, Sweden has a population of 260,200.

We estimate Västerbotten has 14,950 people who might know Jesus, 130,409 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 114,840 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 17 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in Västerbotten, Sweden to the gospel today.
